sql:
SELECT a.id AS PHXal_id, a.idUser AS PHXal_idUser, a.title AS PHXal_title, a.hook AS PHXal_hook, a.content AS PHXal_content, a.url AS PHXal_url, a.date AS PHXal_date, a.idCateg AS PHXal_idCateg, u.login AS PHXal_login 
FROM `articles` a
INNER JOIN `users` u ON u.id = a.idUser

SELECT a.id AS PHXal_id, a.idUser AS PHXal_idUser, a.title AS PHXal_title, a.hook AS PHXal_hook, a.content AS PHXal_content, a.url AS PHXal_url, a.date AS PHXal_date, a.idCateg AS PHXal_idCateg 
FROM `articles` a
WHERE id=21
